title: Account Deletion
content: To delete your account, navigate to Profile > Settings > Account and click 'Delete Account'. This action is irreversible.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. We do not accept cash on delivery.

title: Changing an Order
content: Orders can be modified within 1 hour of placement. After this window, the order enters processing and cannot be changed.

title: International Shipping
content: We ship to over 50 countries. International delivery takes 7-14 business days depending on customs.

title: Subscription Billing
content: Subscriptions are billed on the 1st of every month. You can cancel anytime before the next billing cycle.
